HtmlSelect Module¶

class epyk.core.html.HtmlSelect.Lookup(report, records, htmlCode, width, height, filter, profile, multiple, options)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlSelect.Optgroup(report, data, label)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlSelect.Option(report, value, text, icon, selected)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlSelect.Select(report, records, htmlCode, width, height, filter, profile, multiple, options)¶
change(jsFncs, emtpyFncs=None, profile=False)¶

Javascript event triggered when the value has changed

Parameters

  • jsFncs – List. Set of Javascript function to trigger on this event

  • emtpyFncs – ist. Set of Js function to trigger if the value is empty

  • profile – Boolean. To set the profiling

property dom¶

Javascript Functions

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtmlSelect.DomSelect

property js¶

Javascript Functions

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

https://developer.snapappointments.com/bootstrap-select/methods/

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsSelect.JSelect

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptSelect.OptionsSelect

property style¶

GrpClsList.ClassSelect

Type

rtype

to_word(document)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

to_xls(workbook, worksheet, cursor)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/
